item.title: Convert pandas Dataframe to presence-absence
item.author: Author
item.description: It’s not uncommon in statistical analysis of sequence data to think in terms of presence-absence instead of quantity. In this quick little post, I walk through how to convert a pandas DataFrame of numerical values to one containing 1s and 0s representing presence/absence. I also show how to do this in R, for all you R people.
